title: RCA Refrigerator Fresh Food Door Gasket
description: RCA Refrigerator Fresh Food Door Gasket ★★★★★ ★★★★★ 4 Reviews PartSelect Number PS2364916 Manufacturer Part Number WR24X10229 This white fresh food door gasket is used to seal the refrigerator door when closed to keep the cool air inside and the room air out.

installationInstructions.author: Marty from West Bloomfield, MI
installationInstructions.title: Internal water lines brittle, cracked, leaking
installationInstructions.content: First of all, the larger white plastic tubes in this thing are 5/16" OD, which no plumbing store seems to stock.  At the lower left rear end there are 2 tubes, one for water and one for ice, that are doomed to fail being in proximity of a heat source - they essentially get cooked to the point of becoming brittle and cracking.  The smaller tube and union can be easily found, but do yourself a favor if the larger one cracks and order the plastic tube and water tube union here, and just cut off the brittle part and amend the old tube using the union.
